Order Of The Cockatrice: Must put own interest above others'
Racial Heritage: Counts as both human and chosen race for racial effects

Combat
Hit Points: 150 Initiative: +2 Armor Class: 15 Attacks Per Round: 4 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +20/+23/+22 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +23/35

Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Banner: R60' Allies gain +5 save vs. fear and +4 charge attack when banner visible
Blind-Fight: Reroll concealed miss, no melee bonus to invisible foe, no skill check on blinded full speed move
Braggart: +2 attack vs. demoralized target
Cavalier's Charge: +4 mounted charge attack/No AC penalty after mounted charge
Challenge: Self inflicts +20 HP damage on chosen foe and suffers -2 AC against other foes 7/dy
Coordinated Defense: +2 CMD (+4 vs. larger foe) when adjacent ally has same feat
Coordinated Maneuvers: +2 CMB, +2 CMD, and +4 vs. grapple when adjacent ally has same feat
Critical Focus: +4 confirm critical
Dazzling Display: R30' Intimidate to demoralize foes using focused weapon
Deafening Critical: Critical hit causes permanent deafness (DC 30 Fort deaf for 1 rd)
Demanding Challenge: Challenged target suffers -2 AC from others
Greater Banner: R60' Allies gain +2 save vs. charm and compulsion/Waving banner gives allies additional save vs. spell or effect
Mighty Charge: Dbl threat range during mounted charge/Free bull rush, disarm, sunder, or trip w/out AOO after successful mounted charge
Order Of The Cockatrice: +6 HP damage vs. challenge target
Paired Opportunists: +4 AOO and share ally AOO when ally has same feat and threatens same foe
Shield Wall: +1 shield AC bonus when adjacent ally has same feat and buckler or light shield; +2 w/heavy or tower shield
Steal Glory: May make AOO against threatened target when ally scores a critical hit
Supreme Charge: Mounted charge inflicts dbl damage (lance triple)/Critical hit on mounted charge inflicts stunned (DC 30 Will staggered) for 1d4 rd
Tactician: R30' May share Teamwork feat w/allies for 13 rd 5/dy
Save: Fortitude: +15; Reflex: +8; Will: +7

Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +2
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +1

Mount: Mount has Light Armor Proficiency feature but lacks Share Spells feature

Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
